description: Virusi itera SIDA yandurira mu gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina idakingiye n’umuntu ubana na virusi itera SIDA cyangwa undi wese utizeye.
title: Virusi itera SIDA yandurira mu gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina idakingiye n’umuntu ubana na virusi itera SIDA cyangwa undi wese utizeye.
content:
Virusi itera SIDA yandurira mu gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina idakingiye n’umuntu ubana na virusi itera SIDA cyangwa undi wese utizeye. 
Gupima no gutanga ubujyanama kuri SIDA bishobora gufasha mu kumenya ko umuntu ate ubwandu hakiri kare. Bishobora gufasha abanduye Virusi itera SIDA:

 - Kubona serivisi zibunganira bakeneye.
 - Kuvurwa izindi ndwara zandura baba bate.
 - Kwiga kubana n’ubwandu bwa virusi itera SIDA.
 - Kwiga kutanduza abandi.
